GetAnimalTypeWaterfowl = {
	type = all

	text = {
		trigger = { var:waterfowl_type ?= flag:swan }
		localization_key = animal_type_swan
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { var:waterfowl_type ?= flag:goose }
		localization_key = animal_type_goose
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { var:waterfowl_type ?= flag:duck }
		localization_key = animal_type_duck
	}
}

GetAnimalTypeTame = {
	type = all
	text = {
		trigger = { var:tame_animal_type ?= flag:deer }
		localization_key = animal_type_deer
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { var:tame_animal_type ?= flag:true_deer }
		localization_key = animal_type_true_deer
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { var:tame_animal_type ?= flag:red_deer }
		localization_key = animal_type_red_deer
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { var:tame_animal_type ?= flag:reacher_red_deer }
		localization_key = animal_type_reacher_red_deer
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { var:tame_animal_type ?= flag:tragoneian_stag }
		localization_key = animal_type_tragoneian_stag
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { var:tame_animal_type ?= flag:eastern_deer }
		localization_key = animal_type_eastern_deer
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { var:tame_animal_type ?= flag:fallow_deer }
		localization_key = animal_type_fallow_deer
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { var:tame_animal_type ?= flag:sarradonian_royal_deer }
		localization_key = animal_type_sarradonian_royal_deer
	}
	text = {

GetAnimalTypeMismanaged = {
	type = all
	text = {
		trigger = { var:mismanaged_animal_type ?= flag:deer }
		localization_key = animal_type_deer
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { var:mismanaged_animal_type ?= flag:true_deer }
		localization_key = animal_type_true_deer
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { var:mismanaged_animal_type ?= flag:red_deer }
		localization_key = animal_type_red_deer
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { var:mismanaged_animal_type ?= flag:reacher_red_deer }

	text = {

# Plural - e.g. 'lions'
GetAnimalPlural = {
	type = all
	parent = GetAnimalType
	suffix = _plural
}

GetAnimalTypeTamePlural = {
	type = all
	parent = GetAnimalTypeTame
	suffix = _plural
}

### ANIMAL ARTICLE ###

# e.g. 'an'
GetAnimalArticle = {
	type = all

	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:eastern_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:antelope
				var:animal_type ?= flag:oryx
				var:animal_type ?= flag:elk
				var:animal_type ?= flag:anoa
				var:animal_type ?= flag:elephantid
				var:animal_type ?= flag:elephant
				var:animal_type ?= flag:aurochs
				var:animal_type ?= flag:apep-ibizan
				var:animal_type ?= flag:owlbear
				var:animal_type ?= flag:ibex
				var:animal_type ?= flag:armazli_rhinoceros

### ANIMAL STRIKES ###
 
# Singular - e.g. 'bite'
GetAnimalStrike = {
	type = all
	random_valid = yes
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rabbit
				var:animal_type ?= flag:brown_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:white_hare

# Present - e.g. 'bites'
GetAnimalStrikePresent = {
	type = all
	parent = GetAnimalStrike
	suffix = _present
}

# Present Participle - e.g. 'biting'
GetAnimalStrikeParticiple = {
	type = all
	parent = GetAnimalStrike
	suffix = _participle
}

GetAnimalStrikeParticipleKill = {
	type = all
	random_valid = yes
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:hare
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:rabbit
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:brown_hare
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:white_hare
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:desert_hare
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:rodent
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:porcupine
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:mongoose

				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:red_fox

				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:fennec_fox

				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:valien_diamond
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:crystalline_wisp
			}

### ANIMAL ADJECTIVE ###
# e.g. 'majestic'
GetAnimalAdjective = {
	type = all
	random_valid = yes
	text = {
		trigger = {
			var:animal_type ?= flag:hare
			var:animal_type ?= flag:rabbit
			var:animal_type ?= flag:brown_hare
			var:animal_type ?= flag:white_hare
			var:animal_type ?= flag:desert_hare

			var:animal_type ?= flag:porcupine

			var:animal_type ?= flag:doyarchu
		}

### ANIMAL CHARGE ###

# e.g. lope
GetAnimalCharge = {
	type = all
	random_valid = yes
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rabbit
				var:animal_type ?= flag:brown_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:white_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:desert_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rodent
				var:animal_type ?= flag:porcupine
				var:animal_type ?= flag:mongoose
				var:animal_type ?= flag:fox
				var:animal_type ?= flag:red_fox
				var:animal_type ?= flag:sand_fox
				var:animal_type ?= flag:fennec_fox
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_charge_hurtle
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:true_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:red_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:reacher_red_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:tragoneian_stag
				var:animal_type ?= flag:eastern_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:fallow_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:sarradonian_royal_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:roe
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hog_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:chital
				var:animal_type ?= flag:dire_stag
				var:animal_type ?= flag:antelope
				var:animal_type ?= flag:blackbuck
				var:animal_type ?= flag:gazelle
				var:animal_type ?= flag:white_gazelle

			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_charge_bound

		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:sloth

				var:animal_type ?= flag:dreadleech
				var:animal_type ?= flag:devouring_worm
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_charge_writhe
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:pegasus
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_charge_gallop
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:elemental
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rock_giant
				var:animal_type ?= flag:living_blizzard
				var:animal_type ?= flag:whisperwind
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_charge_floatt
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:manzasiri
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_charge_stride
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:valien_diamond
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_charge_lurch
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:spirit
				var:animal_type ?= flag:banshee
				var:animal_type ?= flag:cor
				var:animal_type ?= flag:djinn
				var:animal_type ?= flag:shade
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_charge_float
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:shetani
				var:animal_type ?= flag:fortune_eater
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_charge_glide
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:devi
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_charge_stampede
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:crystalline_wisp
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hippocampus
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_charge_surge
	}
	text = {

			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:dire_crab
			}
		}

				var:animal_type ?= flag:sea_apparition
				var:animal_type ?= flag:torkyll
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_charge_drift
	}

}

GetAnimalChargeKill = {
	type = activity
	random_valid = yes
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:hare

# e.g. 'lopes'
GetAnimalChargePresent = {
	type = all
	parent = GetAnimalCharge
	suffix = _present
}

GetAnimalChargePresentKill = {
	type = activity
	parent = GetAnimalChargeKill
	suffix = _present
}

# e.g. 'loping'
GetAnimalChargeParticiple = {
	type = all
	parent = GetAnimalCharge
	suffix = _participle
}

GetAnimalChargeParticipleKill = {
	type = activity
	parent = GetAnimalChargeKill
	suffix = _participle
}

### ANIMAL FEATURE ###

# e.g. 'sharpened tusks'
GetAnimalFeature = {
	type = all
	random_valid = yes
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rabbit
				var:animal_type ?= flag:brown_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:white_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:desert_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rodent
				var:animal_type ?= flag:porcupine
				var:animal_type ?= flag:mongoose
				var:animal_type ?= flag:deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:true_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:red_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:reacher_red_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:tragoneian_stag
				var:animal_type ?= flag:eastern_deer

	type = all
	random_valid = yes

			OR = {

#### ANIMAL GROUP ###

# e.g. 'herd'
GetAnimalGroup = {
	type = all
	random_valid = yes
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rabbit
				var:animal_type ?= flag:brown_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:white_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:desert_hare
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_group_husk
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rodent
				var:animal_type ?= flag:porcupine
				var:animal_type ?= flag:mongoose
				var:animal_type ?= flag:pooka
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_group_mischief
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:true_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:red_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:reacher_red_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:tragoneian_stag
				var:animal_type ?= flag:eastern_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:fallow_deer

GetAnimalGroupPlural = {
	type = all
	random_valid = yes
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rabbit
				var:animal_type ?= flag:brown_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:white_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:desert_hare
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_group_husk_plural
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rodent
				var:animal_type ?= flag:porcupine
				var:animal_type ?= flag:mongoose
				var:animal_type ?= flag:pooka
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_group_mischief_plural
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:true_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:red_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:reacher_red_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:tragoneian_stag
				var:animal_type ?= flag:eastern_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:fallow_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:sarradonian_royal_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:roe
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hog_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:chital
				var:animal_type ?= flag:dire_stag
				var:animal_type ?= flag:antelope
				var:animal_type ?= flag:blackbuck
				var:animal_type ?= flag:gazelle
				var:animal_type ?= flag:white_gazelle

### ANIMAL SOUND ###

# Singular - e.g. 'bark'
GetAnimalSound = {
	type = all
	random_valid = yes
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rabbit
				var:animal_type ?= flag:brown_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:white_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:desert_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rodent
				var:animal_type ?= flag:porcupine
				var:animal_type ?= flag:mongoose
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_sound_squeak
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:true_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:red_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:reacher_red_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:tragoneian_stag
				var:animal_type ?= flag:eastern_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:fallow_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:sarradonian_royal_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:roe
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hog_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:chital
				var:animal_type ?= flag:dire_stag
				var:animal_type ?= flag:antelope
				var:animal_type ?= flag:blackbuck
				var:animal_type ?= flag:gazelle
				var:animal_type ?= flag:white_gazelle
				var:animal_type ?= flag:oryx
				var:animal_type ?= flag:screwhorn_antelope
				var:animal_type ?= flag:saiga
				var:animal_type ?= flag:elk
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_sound_snort

# Present - e.g. 'barks'
GetAnimalSoundPresent = {
	type = all
	parent = GetAnimalSound
	suffix = _present
}

# Present Participle - e.g. 'barking'
GetAnimalSoundParticiple = {
	type = all
	parent = GetAnimalSound
	suffix = _participle
}

GetAnimalSoundParticipleKill = {
	type = all
	random_valid = yes
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:hare
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:rabbit
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:brown_hare
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:white_hare
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:desert_hare
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:rodent
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:porcupine
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:mongoose
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_sound_squeak_participle
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:deer
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:true_deer
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:red_deer
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:reacher_red_deer

				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:eastern_deer
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:fallow_deer
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:sarradonian_royal_deer
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:roe
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:hog_deer
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:chital
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:dire_stag
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:antelope
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:blackbuck
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:gazelle
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:white_gazelle
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:oryx
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:screwhorn_antelope
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:saiga
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:elk
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_sound_snort_participle
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:sloth
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:three_toed_sloth

### ANIMAL DANGERS ###

# Plural - e.g. 'claws'
GetAnimalDanger = {
	type = all
	random_valid = yes
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				always = no
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_feature_coat
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				always = no
				var:animal_type ?= flag:deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:true_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:red_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:reacher_red_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:tragoneian_stag
				var:animal_type ?= flag:eastern_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:fallow_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:sarradonian_royal_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:roe
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hog_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:chital
				var:animal_type ?= flag:dire_stag
				var:animal_type ?= flag:elk
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_feature_antlers
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				always = no
				var:animal_type ?= flag:antelope
				var:animal_type ?= flag:blackbuck

GetAnimalDangerKill = {
	type = all
	random_valid = yes
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				always = no
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_feature_coat
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				always = no
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:deer
				var:kill_animal_type ?= flag:true_deer

			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_feature_antlers

### ANIMAL TRACKS ###

# Singular - e.g. 'hoof'
GetAnimalTrack = {
	type = all
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rabbit
				var:animal_type ?= flag:brown_hare

		trigger = {
			OR = {
						var:animal_type ?= flag:buffalo
						var:animal_type ?= flag:true_buffalo
						var:animal_type ?= flag:peninsular_buffalo
						var:animal_type ?= flag:bison
						var:animal_type ?= flag:wood_bison
						var:animal_type ?= flag:steppe_bison
						var:animal_type ?= flag:gaur
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_track_horns
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
						var:animal_type ?= flag:troll
						var:animal_type ?= flag:forest_troll
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_track_fists
	}
}

# Singular - e.g. 'hooves'
GetAnimalTrackPlural = {
	type = all
	parent = GetAnimalTrack
	suffix = _plural
}

### ANIMAL COLOR ###

### ANIMAL MALE ###

# e.g. 'bull'
GetAnimalMale = {
	type = all
	random_valid = yes
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rabbit
				var:animal_type ?= flag:brown_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:white_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:desert_hare
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_male_jack
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rodent
				var:animal_type ?= flag:porcupine
				var:animal_type ?= flag:mongoose
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_male_buck
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:true_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:red_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:reacher_red_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:tragoneian_stag
				var:animal_type ?= flag:eastern_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:fallow_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:sarradonian_royal_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hog_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:chital
				var:animal_type ?= flag:antelope
				var:animal_type ?= flag:blackbuck
				var:animal_type ?= flag:gazelle
				var:animal_type ?= flag:white_gazelle
				var:animal_type ?= flag:oryx
				var:animal_type ?= flag:screwhorn_antelope
				var:animal_type ?= flag:saiga
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_male_stag
	}

		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:roe
			}
		}

### ANIMAL FEMALE ###

# e.g. 'cow'
GetAnimalFemale = {
	type = all
	random_valid = yes
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rabbit
				var:animal_type ?= flag:brown_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:white_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:desert_hare
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_female_jill
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rodent
				var:animal_type ?= flag:porcupine
				var:animal_type ?= flag:mongoose
				var:animal_type ?= flag:deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:true_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:red_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:reacher_red_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:tragoneian_stag
				var:animal_type ?= flag:eastern_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:fallow_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:sarradonian_royal_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:roe
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hog_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:chital
				var:animal_type ?= flag:antelope
				var:animal_type ?= flag:blackbuck
				var:animal_type ?= flag:gazelle
				var:animal_type ?= flag:white_gazelle
				var:animal_type ?= flag:oryx
				var:animal_type ?= flag:screwhorn_antelope
				var:animal_type ?= flag:saiga
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_female_doe
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:dire_stag
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_female_dire_doe
	}
	text = {

			OR = {

### ANIMAL CHILD ###

#e.g. 'calf'
GetAnimalChild = {
	type = all
	random_valid = yes
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rabbit
				var:animal_type ?= flag:brown_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:white_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:desert_hare
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_child_leveret
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rodent
				var:animal_type ?= flag:porcupine
				var:animal_type ?= flag:mongoose
				var:animal_type ?= flag:sloth
				var:animal_type ?= flag:three_toed_sloth
				var:animal_type ?= flag:opakhasian_bear
				var:animal_type ?= flag:bin_nalmicaa
				var:animal_type ?= flag:fox
				var:animal_type ?= flag:red_fox
				var:animal_type ?= flag:sand_fox
				var:animal_type ?= flag:fennec_fox
				var:animal_type ?= flag:canine
				var:animal_type ?= flag:wolf
				var:animal_type ?= flag:steppe_wolf
				var:animal_type ?= flag:jackal
				var:animal_type ?= flag:lymrill
				var:animal_type ?= flag:crocotta
				var:animal_type ?= flag:apep-ibizan
				var:animal_type ?= flag:kursha
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hyena
				var:animal_type ?= flag:bat
				var:animal_type ?= flag:vampire_bat
				var:animal_type ?= flag:guardian_hammerhead
				var:animal_type ?= flag:seal
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_child_pup
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:true_deer

			}

	text = {
		trigger = { always = no }
		localization_key = hunt_animal_child_fallback
	}
}

### ANIMAL YOUNG ###

# e.g. 'brocket'
GetAnimalYoung = {
	type = activity
	random_valid = yes

	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:stag
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hart
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_young_brocket
	}

	text = {
		trigger = { var:animal_type ?= flag:boar }
		localization_key = hunt_animal_young_squeaker
	}

	text = {
		trigger = { always = no }
		localization_key = hunt_animal_young_fallback
	}
}

	type = province
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_hunt_animal_deer_trigger = yes
			GH_hunt_animal_true_deer_trigger = no
			GH_hunt_animal_fallow_deer_trigger = no
			GH_hunt_animal_roe_trigger = no
			GH_hunt_animal_hog_deer_trigger = no
			GH_hunt_animal_dire_stag_trigger = no
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_deer
	}

			GH_hunt_animal_true_deer_trigger = yes

### TRINKET ARTIFACTS ###

# e.g. 'antler'
ArtifactAnimalTrinketType = {
	type = artifact

	text = {
		trigger = { has_artifact_feature = animal_trinket_type_antler }
		localization_key = feature_animal_trinket_type_antler
	}

	text = {
		trigger = { has_artifact_feature = animal_trinket_type_horn }
		localization_key = feature_animal_trinket_type_horn
	}

	text = {
		trigger = { has_artifact_feature = animal_trinket_type_tusk }
		localization_key = feature_animal_trinket_type_tusk
	}

	text = {
		trigger = { has_artifact_feature = animal_trinket_type_claws }
		localization_key = feature_animal_trinket_type_claws
	}

	text = {
		trigger = { has_artifact_feature = animal_trinket_type_fangs }
		localization_key = feature_animal_trinket_type_fangs
	}

	text = {
		trigger = { has_artifact_feature = animal_trinket_type_tail }
		localization_key = feature_animal_trinket_type_tail
	}

	text = {
		trigger = { has_artifact_feature = animal_trinket_type_foot }
		localization_key = feature_animal_trinket_type_foot
	}
}

### SAFETY LEVEL ###

# e.g. 'Danger: Harmless'
ActivityAnimalSafety = {
	type = activity
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				always = no
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rabbit
				var:animal_type ?= flag:brown_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:white_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:desert_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rodent
				var:animal_type ?= flag:porcupine

### PRESTIGE LEVEL ###

# e.g. 'Prestige: Glorious'
ActivityAnimalPrestige = {
	type = activity
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				always = no
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rabbit
				var:animal_type ?= flag:brown_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:white_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:desert_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rodent
				var:animal_type ?= flag:porcupine
				var:animal_type ?= flag:mongoose
				var:animal_type ?= flag:sloth
				var:animal_type ?= flag:three_toed_sloth
				var:animal_type ?= flag:fox
				var:animal_type ?= flag:red_fox
				var:animal_type ?= flag:sand_fox
				var:animal_type ?= flag:fennec_fox
				var:animal_type ?= flag:goat

### REGIONAL ANIMALS ###

# e.g. 'elk'
GetRegionalDeerType = {
	type = character
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_deer_trigger = yes
				GH_hunt_animal_true_deer_trigger = no
				GH_hunt_animal_fallow_deer_trigger = no
				GH_hunt_animal_roe_trigger = no
				GH_hunt_animal_hog_deer_trigger = no
				GH_hunt_animal_dire_stag_trigger = no
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_deer
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_true_deer_trigger = yes
				GH_hunt_animal_red_deer_trigger = no
				GH_hunt_animal_eastern_deer_trigger = no
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_true_deer
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_red_deer_trigger = yes
				GH_hunt_animal_reacher_red_deer_trigger = no
				GH_hunt_animal_tragoneian_stag_trigger = no
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_red_deer
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_reacher_red_deer_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_reacher_red_deer
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_tragoneian_stag_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_tragoneian_stag
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_eastern_deer_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_eastern_deer
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_fallow_deer_trigger = yes
				GH_hunt_animal_sarradonian_royal_deer_trigger = no
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_fallow_deer
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_sarradonian_royal_deer_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_sarradonian_royal_deer
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_roe_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_roe
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_hog_deer_trigger = yes
				GH_hunt_animal_chital_trigger = no
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_hog_deer
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_chital_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_chital
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_dire_stag_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_dire_stag
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_antelope_trigger = yes
				GH_hunt_animal_blackbuck_trigger = no
				GH_hunt_animal_gazelle_trigger = no
				GH_hunt_animal_oryx_trigger = no
				GH_hunt_animal_screwhorn_antelope_trigger = no
				GH_hunt_animal_saiga_trigger = no
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_antelope
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_blackbuck_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_blackbuck
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_gazelle_trigger = yes
				GH_hunt_animal_white_gazelle_trigger = no
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_gazelle
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_white_gazelle_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_white_gazelle
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_oryx_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_oryx
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_screwhorn_antelope_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_screwhorn_antelope
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_saiga_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_saiga
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_elk_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_elk
	}
}

GetRegionalEagleType = {
	type = character
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_raptor_trigger = yes
				GH_hunt_animal_eagle_trigger = no
				GH_hunt_animal_roc_trigger = no
				GH_hunt_animal_falcon_trigger = no
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_raptor
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_eagle_trigger = yes
				GH_hunt_animal_steppe_eagle_trigger = no
				GH_hunt_animal_sarradonian_eagle_trigger = no
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_eagle
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_steppe_eagle_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_steppe_eagle
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_sarradonian_eagle_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_sarradonian_eagle
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_roc_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_roc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_falcon_trigger = yes
				GH_hunt_animal_royal_falcon_trigger = no
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_falcon
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			location = {
				GH_hunt_animal_royal_falcon_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = animal_type_royal_falcon
	}
}

GetRegionalWolfType = {
	type = character
}

GetRegionalWolfPlural = {
	type = character
	parent = GetRegionalWolfType
	suffix = _plural
}

### LEGENDARY COLOR ###

# e.g. 'white'
GetLegendaryColor = {
	type = all
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rabbit
				var:animal_type ?= flag:brown_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:white_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:desert_hare
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rodent
				var:animal_type ?= flag:porcupine
				var:animal_type ?= flag:mongoose
				var:animal_type ?= flag:snake
				var:animal_type ?= flag:king_cobra
				var:animal_type ?= flag:emperor_cobra
				var:animal_type ?= flag:twin-serpent
				var:animal_type ?= flag:reptile
				var:animal_type ?= flag:rovarskan_dragon
				var:animal_type ?= flag:great_rahksasa
				var:animal_type ?= flag:crocodile
				var:animal_type ?= flag:spriggan
				var:animal_type ?= flag:wood_woad
				var:animal_type ?= flag:meadow_spriggan
				var:animal_type ?= flag:forest_spriggan
				var:animal_type ?= flag:leshen
				var:animal_type ?= flag:wildfire_spriggan
				var:animal_type ?= flag:cedar_spriggan
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_animal_color_rainbow
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				var:animal_type ?= flag:deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:true_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:red_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:reacher_red_deer
				var:animal_type ?= flag:tragoneian_stag
				var:animal_type ?= flag:eastern_deer

### RAPTOR TYPE ###

GetRaptorType = {
	type = all

	text = {
		trigger = { var:raptor_type = flag:hawk }
		localization_key = animal_type_hawk
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { var:raptor_type = flag:falcon }
		localization_key = animal_type_falcon
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { always = no }
		localization_key = animal_type_raptor
		fallback = yes
	}
}

GetRaptorPlural = {
	type = all

	text = {
		trigger = { var:raptor_type = flag:hawk }
		localization_key = animal_type_hawk_plural
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { var:raptor_type = flag:falcon }
		localization_key = animal_type_falcon_plural
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { always = no }
		localization_key = animal_type_raptor_plural
		fallback = yes
	}
}

GetHuntMartialGender = {
	type = character

	text = {
		trigger = {
			save_temporary_scope_as = host
			dummy_female = {
				can_be_combatant_based_on_gender_trigger = { ARMY_OWNER = scope:host }
			}
			NOT = {
				dummy_male = {
					can_be_combatant_based_on_gender_trigger = { ARMY_OWNER = scope:host }
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_martial_gender_female
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			save_temporary_scope_as = host
			dummy_male = {
				can_be_combatant_based_on_gender_trigger = { ARMY_OWNER = scope:host }
			}
			NOT = {
				dummy_female = {
					can_be_combatant_based_on_gender_trigger = { ARMY_OWNER = scope:host }
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_martial_gender_male
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			save_temporary_scope_as = host
			dummy_male = {
				can_be_combatant_based_on_gender_trigger = { ARMY_OWNER = scope:host }
			}
			dummy_female = {
				can_be_combatant_based_on_gender_trigger = { ARMY_OWNER = scope:host }
			}
		}
		localization_key = hunt_martial_gender_equal
	}
}

################
# GH ADDITIONS #
################

# Frequency loc for individual creatures
hare_frequency_loc = {
	type = province
	
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_hare_province_frequency_value <= 0
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_extinct
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_hare_province_frequency_value > 0
			GH_hunt_animal_hare_seasonally_available_trigger = no
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_hibernating
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_hare_province_frequency_value < 10
			GH_animal_hare_province_frequency_value > 0
			GH_hunt_animal_hare_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_elusive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_hare_province_frequency_value < 20
			GH_hunt_animal_hare_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_very_rare
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_hare_province_frequency_value < 30
			GH_hunt_animal_hare_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_rare
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_hare_province_frequency_value < 50
			GH_hunt_animal_hare_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_uncommon
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_hare_province_frequency_value < 80
			GH_hunt_animal_hare_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_frequent
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_hare_province_frequency_value >= 80
			GH_hunt_animal_hare_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_abundant
	}
}

zebra_frequency_loc = {
	type = province
	
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_zebra_province_frequency_value <= 0
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_extinct
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_zebra_province_frequency_value > 0
			GH_hunt_animal_zebra_seasonally_available_trigger = no
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_hibernating
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_zebra_province_frequency_value < 10
			GH_animal_zebra_province_frequency_value > 0
			GH_hunt_animal_zebra_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_elusive

			GH_hunt_animal_zebra_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_very_rare

			GH_hunt_animal_zebra_seasonally_available_trigger = yes

		localization_key = creature_abundance_rare

		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_uncommon

			GH_animal_quail_province_frequency_value > 0
			GH_hunt_animal_quail_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_elusive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_quail_province_frequency_value < 20
			GH_hunt_animal_quail_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_very_rare
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_quail_province_frequency_value < 30
			GH_hunt_animal_quail_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_rare

	text = {

			GH_hunt_animal_quail_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_uncommon

		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_extinct

	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_shearwater_province_frequency_value > 0
			GH_hunt_animal_shearwater_seasonally_available_trigger = no
			GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = winter }
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_wintering
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_shearwater_province_frequency_value > 0
			GH_hunt_animal_shearwater_seasonally_available_trigger = no
			NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = winter } }
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_breeding

	text = {

		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_very_rare
	}
	text = {

			GH_hunt_animal_shearwater_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_rare

	type = province
	
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_pegasus_province_frequency_value <= 0
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_extinct
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_pegasus_province_frequency_value > 0
			GH_hunt_animal_pegasus_seasonally_available_trigger = no
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_hibernating
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_pegasus_province_frequency_value < 10
			GH_animal_pegasus_province_frequency_value > 0
			GH_hunt_animal_pegasus_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_elusive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_pegasus_province_frequency_value < 20
			GH_hunt_animal_pegasus_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_very_rare
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_pegasus_province_frequency_value < 30
			GH_hunt_animal_pegasus_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_rare
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_pegasus_province_frequency_value < 50
			GH_hunt_animal_pegasus_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_uncommon
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_pegasus_province_frequency_value < 80
			GH_hunt_animal_pegasus_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_frequent
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			GH_animal_pegasus_province_frequency_value >= 80
			GH_hunt_animal_pegasus_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = creature_abundance_abundant
	}
}
